text: The 2017 West Coast Conference Women's Basketball Tournament was held from March 2–7, 2017 at Orleans Arena in the Las Vegas Valley community of Paradise, Nevada. Seeds were determined solely on conference record. Regular- season champion Gonzaga added the tournament crown to its résumé, earning the conference's automatic bid to the 2017 NCAA Division I Women's Basketball Tournament. ==Seeds== WCC tiebreaker procedures went as follows: # Head-to- head # Record against the top-seeded team(s) not involved in the tie, going down through the seedings as needed # Higher RPI {| class="wikitable"
